/* cetusContents.contentPageList */ SELECT uid , workplace_uid , title , description , contents , metadata , ratings , sample_data , file_uid , thumbnail_uid , reg_uid , TO_CHAR(reg_dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MM') AS reg_dt , updt_uid , TO_CHAR(updt_dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MM') AS updt_dt FROM cetus_contents WHERE workplace_uid = #{workplaceUid} ORDER BY reg_dt DESC

/* cetusContents.view */ SELECT DISTINCT cc.uid , cc.workplace_uid , cc.title , cc.description , cc.contents , cc.metadata , cc.ratings , cc.sample_data , cc.file_uid , cf.file_id , cf.file_path , cf.file_type , cf.org_file_nm AS file_name , cc.thumbnail_uid , cf2.file_id AS thumbnail_id , cc.reg_uid , TO_CHAR(cc.reg_dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MM') AS reg_dt , cc.updt_uid , TO_CHAR(cc.updt_dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MM') AS updt_dt FROM cetus_contents cc LEFT JOIN k_3xmeta.cetus_file cf ON cc.file_uid = cf.file_uid LEFT JOIN k_3xmeta.cetus_file cf2 ON cc.thumbnail_uid = cf2.file_uid WHERE cc.uid = #{uid} LIMIT 1
